K10adbhutdu:1: [0] evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāse.
K10adbhutdu:2: [1] athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat.
K10adbhutdu:3: adrākṣīd āyuṣmān ānando rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāṇo 'nyatamasmin pradeśe
K10adbhutdu:5: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tasyaitad abhavat. yaḥ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā
K10adbhutdu:6: īdṛśaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kārayitvā caturdiśe bhikṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhatḥ
K10adbhutdu:7: samyaksaṃbuddhasyāmalakapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed
K10adbhutdu:8: badarīpatramātraṃ cchatraṃ yavaphalapramāṇāṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ
K10adbhutdu:9: dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tat katamaṃ tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ syāt?
K10adbhutdu:10: athāyuṣmata ānandasyaitad abhavat. śāstā me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ sugato me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ.
K10adbhutdu:11: yaṇv aham etam evārthaṃ bhagavata ārocayeyaṃ yathā me sa bhagavāṃ vyākariṣyati tathāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīty.
K10adbhutdu:12: [2] athāyuṣmān ānando rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtya paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ
K10adbhutdu:13: pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya
K10adbhutdu:14: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt. ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam
K10adbhutdu:15: idam avocat. ihāhaṃ bhadanta pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya
K10adbhutdu:16: prāvikṣaṃ. so 'ham adrākṣam rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāṇo 'nyatamasmin
K10adbhutdu:17: pradeśe kūṭāgāram aśītidvāram ulliptāvaliptam ucchṛtadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaṃ
K10adbhutdu:18: ca dṛṣṭvā ca punar me etad abhavat. yaḥ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K10adbhutdu:19: vā īdṛśaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ caturdiśe bhikṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhatḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
K10adbhutdu:20: parinirvṛtasya mṛttikāpiṇḍād āmalakapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim
K10adbhutdu:21: āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchatraṃ yavaphalapramāṇāṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ
K10adbhutdu:22: dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tat katamaṃ tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ syāt?
K10adbhutdu:23: tasya mamaitad abhavat. śāstā me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ sugato me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ. yanv aham etam evārthaṃ bhagavata ārocayeyaṃ yathā bhagavāṃ vyākariṣyati tathāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīty.
K10adbhutdu:25: idam avocat. sādhu sādhv ānanda bahujanahitāya tvam ānanda pratipanno ca bahujanasukhāya
K10adbhutdu:26: lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ yas tvaṃ tathāgatam etam evārthaṃ
K10adbhutdu:27: paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase. tena hy ānanda śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru,
K10adbhutdu:28: bhāṣiṣye. jambūdvīpo hy ānanda dvīpaḥ saptayojanasahasrāṇy āyāmavistāreṇa uttaraviśālo
K10adbhutdu:29: dakṣiṇena śakaṭāmukhaḥ tam enam kāscic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ
K10adbhutdu:31: vā bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayet. yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya
K10adbhutdu:32: mṛttikāpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ vā yaṣṭim āropayet
K10adbhutdu:33: badarīpatramātracchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet,
K10adbhutdu:34: idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
K10adbhutdu:35: [4] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. asty ānanda pūrvavideho nāma dvīpo 'ṣṭauyojanasahasrāṇy
K10adbhutdu:36: āyāmavistāreṇa samantād ardhacandrākārapariṇāmitaḥ. tam enaṃ kaścit śrāddhaḥ kulaputro
K10adbhutdu:37: vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayet yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ
K10adbhutdu:38: samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet
K10adbhutdu:39: sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ
K10adbhutdu:40: kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
K10adbhutdu:41: [5] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. asty ānandāvaragodānīyo nāma dvīpo navayojanasahasrāṇy
K10adbhutdu:42: āyāmavistāreṇa samantāt pūrṇacandrākārapariṇāmitaḥ. tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro
K10adbhutdu:43: vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā yāvac cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo
K10adbhutdu:44: vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ
K10adbhutdu:45: stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ
K10adbhutdu:46: pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
K10adbhutdu:47: [6] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo
K10adbhutdu:48: dvīpaḥ. asty ānanda uttarakurur nāma dvīpaḥ daśayojanasahasrāṇy āyāmavistāreṇa samantāt
K10adbhutdu:49: samantacaturasraḥ. tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ
K10adbhutdu:50: kṛtvā yāvac cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya
K10adbhutdu:51: parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim
K10adbhutdu:52: āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ
K10adbhutdu:53: dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
K10adbhutdu:54: [7] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpas. tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo
K10adbhutdu:55: dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatūttarakuru dvīpaḥ. asty ānanda śakrasya devānām indrasya vaijayanto
K10adbhutdu:56: nāma prāsādaḥ. tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ
K10adbhutdu:57: kṛtvā yāvac cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya
K10adbhutdu:58: parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim
K10adbhutdu:59: āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ
K10adbhutdu:60: dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
K10adbhutdu:61: [8] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo
K10adbhutdu:62: dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatūttarakuru dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatu śakrasya devānām indrasya vaijayantaḥ
K10adbhutdu:63: prāsādaḥ. asty ānanda trisāharsamahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ. tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ
K10adbhutdu:64: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā srotāpannebhyaḥ sakṛdāgāmibhyo 'nāgāmibhyo
K10adbhutdu:65: 'rhadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaś yāvac cāturdiśe vā bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ
K10adbhutdu:66: samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet
K10adbhutdu:67: sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ
K10adbhutdu:68: kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
K10adbhutdu:69: [9] tat kasya hetoḥ. aprameyo hy ānanda tathāgato dānenāprameyaḥ śīlenāprameyaḥ kṣāntyāprameyo
K10adbhutdu:70: vīryeṇāprameyo tyāgenāprameyo maitryāprameyaḥ karuṇayāprameyo muditayāprameya upekṣayā
K10adbhutdu:71: caturbhir vaiśāradyais daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair
K10adbhutdu:73: [10] evam ukto āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat:
K10adbhutdu:74: āścaryaṃ bhagavann āścaryaṃ sugata yāvad ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ. ko nāmāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ.
K10adbhutdu:75: kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi. tasmāt tarhi tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyam adbhutam adbhutadharmaparyāyaṃ
K10adbhutdu:76: iti dhāraya. idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te bhikṣava āyuṣmāṃś cānando bhagavato
